__e: I didn't save your life, so don't think you have to say something to me.
I owe the man a favor, so I would like to do this for him somehow.
I owe it to him... to you... to let you find your happiness... even if it means helping you walk out of here.
You owe the person that saved you, don't you think?
Well, I think I know what it's like to be beholden to a master.
If she might have one moment of your time, I would be forever in your debt.
Tell me, what must I do to prove I am forever indebted to you for saving my father's life? !
I'm then indebted to them for the car, which means the next time one of them asks,
I'm telling you this "cause I owe you one forthe other day!
